Other Functions.html#/s:F16MapboxNavigat.name: wrap(_:min:max:)
Other Functions.html#/s:F16MapboxNavigat.abstract: Returns a normalized number given min and max bounds.

Extensions/String.html#/s:vE16MapboxNavi.name: nonEmptyString
Extensions/String.html#/s:vE16MapboxNavi.abstract: Check if the current string is empty. If the string is empty, nil is returned, otherwise, the string is returned.

Extensions/RouteStep.html#/s:FE16MapboxN.name: roadDescription(markedUpWithSSML:)
Extensions/RouteStep.html#/s:FE16MapboxN.abstract: Returns a string describing the step’s road by its name, route number, or both, depending on the kind of road.

Extensions/Locale.html#/s:ZvE16MapboxNav.name: preferredLocalLanguageCountryCode
Extensions/Locale.html#/s:ZvE16MapboxNav.abstract: Given the app’s localized language setting, returns a string representing the user’s localization.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:ZFE16MapboxNavi.name: locations(from:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:ZFE16MapboxNavi.abstract: Initializes a [CLLocation] from a JSON string at a given filePath.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.name: general
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.abstract: Indicates general feedback. You should provide a description string to RouteController.recordFeedback() to elaborate on the feedback if possible.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.name: accident
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of an accident or crash

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.name: hazard
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of a road hazard such as debris, stopped vehicles, etc.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.name: roadClosed
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of a closed road that should not allow vehicles

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.name: unallowedTurn
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.abstract: Identifies the feedback as a turn that isn’t allowed. For example, if a user is instructed to make a left turn, but the turn isn’t allowed.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.name: routingError
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/s:FO16MapboxNav.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of a poor instruction or route choice. This could be used to indicate an ambiguous or poorly-timed turn announcement, or a set of confusing turns.

Enums/FeedbackType.html.name: FeedbackType
Enums/FeedbackType.html.abstract: Feedback type is used to specify the type of feedback being recorded with RouteController.recordFeedback().

Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.name: RouteControllerDidFindFasterRouteKey
Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.abstract: Key used for accessing a Bool as to whether the reroute occurced because a faster route was found.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.name: RouteControllerMotorwayHighAlertDistance
Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.abstract: Remaing distance on a motorway at which the AlertLevel.high AlertLevel will be given. This overrides RouteControllerHighAlertInterval only when the current step is a motorway. Default value is a half mile.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.name: RouteControllerMotorwayMediumAlertDistance
Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.abstract: Remaing distance on a motorway at which the AlertLevel.medium AlertLevel will be given. This overrides RouteControllerMediumAlertInterval only when the current step is a motorway. Defauly value is 2 miles.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.name: NavigationMetricsDebugLoggingEnabled
Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.abstract: :nodoc This is used internally for debugging metrics

Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.name: RouteControllerMinimumSpeedThresholdForSnappingUserToRoute
Other Global Variables.html#/s:v16Mapbox.abstract: The mimimum speed value before the user is snapped to the route. This is used to overcome inaccurate course values when a user’s speed is low.

Classes/VisualInstructionFormatter.html#.name: string(leg:step:)
Classes/VisualInstructionFormatter.html#.abstract: Creates the optimal text to be displayed given a RouteLeg and RouteStep.

Classes/SpokenInstructionFormatter.html#.name: string(routeProgress:userDistance:markUpWithSSML:)
Classes/SpokenInstructionFormatter.html#.abstract: Creates a string used for announcing a step.

Classes/SpokenDistanceFormatter.html#/s:.name: string(from:)
Classes/SpokenDistanceFormatter.html#/s:.abstract: Returns a more human readable String from a given CLLocationDistance.

Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html#/s.name: init(route:)
Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html#/s.abstract: Initalizes a new SimulatedLocationManager with the given route.

Classes/ReplayLocationManager.html#/s:vC.name: speedMultiplier
Classes/ReplayLocationManager.html#/s:vC.abstract: speedMultiplier adjusts the speed of the replay.

Classes/PollyVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: globalVoiceId
Classes/PollyVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: Forces Polly voice to always be of specified type. If not set, a localized voice will be used.

Classes/PollyVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: regionType
Classes/PollyVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: regionType specifies what AWS region to use for Polly.

Classes/PollyVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: identityPoolId
Classes/PollyVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: identityPoolId is a required value for using AWS Polly voice instead of iOS’s built in AVSpeechSynthesizer.

Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/s:F.name: init(waypoints:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/s:F.abstract: Initializes a navigation route options object for routes between the given waypoints and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/s:F.name: init(locations:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/s:F.abstract: Initializes a navigation route options object for routes between the given locations and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/s:F.name: init(coordinates:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/s:F.abstract: Initializes a route options object for routes between the given geographic coordinates and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/NavigationLocationManager.html#/.name: isPluggedIn
Classes/NavigationLocationManager.html#/.abstract: Indicates whether the device is plugged in or not.

Classes/NavigationLocationManager.html#/.name: automaticallyUpdatesDesiredAccuracy
Classes/NavigationLocationManager.html#/.abstract: Indicates whether the location manager’s desired accuracy should update

Classes/DayStyle.html.name: DayStyle
Classes/DayStyle.html.abstract: DefaultStyle is default style for Mapbox Navigation SDK.

Classes/NightStyle.html.name: NightStyle
Classes/NightStyle.html.abstract: NightStyle is default night style for Mapbox Navigation SDK. Only will be applied when necessary and if automaticallyAdjustStyleForSunPosition.

Classes/NavigationLocationManager.html.name: NavigationLocationManager
Classes/NavigationLocationManager.html.abstract: NavigationViewController is the base location manager which handles

Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html.name: NavigationRouteOptions
Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html.abstract: A NavigationRouteOptions object specifies turn-by-turn-optimized criteria for results returned by the Mapbox Directions API.

Classes/PollyVoiceController.html.name: PollyVoiceController
Classes/PollyVoiceController.html.abstract: PollyVoiceController extends the default RouteVoiceController by providing support for AWSPolly. RouteVoiceController will be used as a fallback during poor network conditions.

Classes/ReplayLocationManager.html.name: ReplayLocationManager
Classes/ReplayLocationManager.html.abstract: ReplayLocationManager replays an array of locations exactly as they were

Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html.name: SimulatedLocationManager
Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html.abstract: The SimulatedLocationManager class simulates location updates along a given route.

Classes/SpokenDistanceFormatter.html.name: SpokenDistanceFormatter
Classes/SpokenDistanceFormatter.html.abstract: Provides appropriately formatted, localized descriptions of linear distances for voice use.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: MaxSecondsSpentTravelingAwayFromStartOfRoute
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Maximum number of seconds the user can travel away from the start of the route before rerouting occurs

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerDeadReckoningTimeInterval
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: When calculating whether or not the user is on the route, we look where the user will be given their speed and this variable.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerHighAlertInterval
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Number of seconds left on step when a AlertLevel.high alert is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerManeuverZoneRadius
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Radius in meters the user must enter to count as completing a step. One of two heuristics used to know when a user completes a step, see RouteControllerMaximumAllowedDegreeOffsetForTurnCompletion.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMaxManipulatedCourseAngle
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Maximum angle the user puck will be rotated when snapping the user’s course to the route line.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMaximumAllowedDegreeOffsetForTurnCompletion
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Threshold user must be in within to count as completing a step. One of two heuristics used to know when a user completes a step, see RouteControllerManeuverZoneRadius.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMaximumDistanceBeforeRecalculating
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Maximum number of meters the user can travel away from step before RouteControllerShouldReroute is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMediumAlertInterval
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Number of seconds left on step when a AlertLevel.medium alert is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerUserLocationSnappingDistance
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Accepted deviation excluding horizontal accuracy before the user is considered to be off route.

Enums/AlertLevel.html#/s:FO16MapboxNavig.name: low
Enums/AlertLevel.html#/s:FO16MapboxNavig.abstract: The user has recently completed a step.

Enums/AlertLevel.html#/s:FO16MapboxNavig.name: high
Enums/AlertLevel.html#/s:FO16MapboxNavig.abstract: The user is at or very close to the maneuver point

Enums/AlertLevel.html.name: AlertLevel
Enums/AlertLevel.html.abstract: An AlertLevel indicates the user’s general progress toward a step’s maneuver point. A change to the current alert level is often an opportunity to present the user with a visual or voice notification about the upcoming maneuver.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChange
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted when the alert level changes. This indicates the user should be notified about the upcoming maneuver.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChangeNotificationDistanceToEndOfManeuverKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the user’s snapped distance to the end of the maneuver (CLLocationDistance) from a RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChangeNotificationRouteProgressKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the RouteProgress object from a RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerDidFailToReroute
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted after the user has gone off-route but the RouteController failed to reroute.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerDidReroute
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted after the user has gone off-route and the RouteController rerouted.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerNotificationErrorKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the error from a RouteControllerDidFailToReroute notification’s userInfo dictionary.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerNotificationLocationKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the user’s current CLLocation from a RouteControllerWillReroute notification’s userInfo dictionary.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerNotificationRouteKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the newly rerouted Route from a RouteControllerDidReroute notification’s userInfo dictionary.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerProgressDidChange
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted when the user moves along the route.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerProgressDidChangeNotificationLocationKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the CLLocation object from a RouteControllerProgressDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerProgressDidChangeNotificationProgressKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the RouteProgress object from a RouteControllerProgressDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerProgressDidChangeNotificationSecondsRemainingOnStepKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the number of seconds left on a step (Double) from a RouteControllerProgressDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerWillReroute
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted when the user has gone off-route and the RouteController is about to reroute.

Classes/DistanceFormatter.html#/s:FC16Ma.name: string(from:)
Classes/DistanceFormatter.html#/s:FC16Ma.abstract: Returns a more human readable String from a given CLLocationDistance.

Classes/DistanceFormatter.html.name: DistanceFormatter
Classes/DistanceFormatter.html.abstract: Provides appropriately formatted, localized descriptions of linear distances.

Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.name: tintColor
Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.abstract: Sets the tint color for guidance arrow, highlighted text, progress bar and more.

Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.name: fontFamily
Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.abstract: Sets the font family for all labels.

Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.name: styleType
Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.abstract: Describes the situations in which the style should be used. By default, the style will be used during the daytime.

Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.name: mapStyleURL
Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.abstract: Map style to be used for the style.

Classes/Style.html#/s:FC16MapboxNavigati.name: apply()
Classes/Style.html#/s:FC16MapboxNavigati.abstract: Applies the style for all changed properties.

Classes/Style.html.name: Style
Classes/Style.html.abstract: Style is a convenient wrapper for styling the appearance of various interface components throughout the Navigation UI.

Extensions/MGLMapView.html#/s:vE16Mapbox.name: showsTraffic
Extensions/MGLMapView.html#/s:vE16Mapbox.abstract: Toggle traffic on a map style that contains a Mapbox Traffic source.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:FC16Ma.name: showRoute(_:legIndex:)
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:FC16Ma.abstract: Adds or updates both the route line and the route line casing

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:FC16Ma.name: removeRoute()
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:FC16Ma.abstract: Removes route line and route line casing from map

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:FC16Ma.name: showWaypoints(_:legIndex:)
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:FC16Ma.abstract: Adds the route waypoints to the map given the current leg index. Previous waypoints for completed legs will be omitted.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:FC16Ma.name: addArrow(route:legIndex:stepIndex:)
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:FC16Ma.abstract: Shows the step arrow given the current RouteProgress.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html.name: NavigationMapView
Classes/NavigationMapView.html.abstract: NavigationMapView is a subclass of MGLMapView with convenience functions for adding Route lines to a map.

Extensions/MGLMapView.html.name: MGLMapView
Extensions/MGLMapView.html.abstract: An extension on MGLMapView that allows for toggling traffic on a map style that contains a Mapbox Traffic source.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Returns distance user has traveled along current step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: userDistanceToManeuverLocation
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Returns distance from user to end of step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: distanceRemaining
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Total distance in meters remaining on current step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing fraction of current step traveled.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: durationRemaining
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Number of seconds remaining on current step.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Total distance traveled in meters along current leg.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: durationRemaining
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Duration remaining in seconds on current leg.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing how far along the current leg the user has traveled.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.name: stepBefore(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.abstract: Returns the RouteStep before a given step. Returns nil if there is no step prior.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.name: stepAfter(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.abstract: Returns the RouteStep after a given step. Returns nil if there is not a step after.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: currentStep
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Returns the current RouteStep for the leg the user is on.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.name: isCurrentStep(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.abstract: Return bool whether step provided is the current RouteStep the user is on.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: nearbyCoordinates
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Returns an array of CLLocationCoordinate2D of the prior, current and upcoming step geometry.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: currentLeg
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: If waypoints are provided in the Route, this will contain which leg the user is on.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: Total distance traveled by user along all legs.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing how far along the Route the user has traveled.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: distanceRemaining
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: Total distance remaining in meters along route.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: remainingWaypoints
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: Number of waypoints remaining on the current route.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:C16MapboxN.name: TimedCongestionLevel
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:C16MapboxN.abstract: Tuple containing a CongestionLevel and a corresponding TimeInterval representing the expected travel time for this segment.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: congestionTravelTimesSegmentsByStep
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: If the route contains both segmentCongestionLevels and expectedSegmentTravelTimes, this property is set to a deeply nested array of TimeCongestionLevels per segment per step per leg.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: congestionTimesPerStep
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: An dictionary containing a TimeInterval total per CongestionLevel. Only CongestionLevel founnd on that step will present. Broken up by leg and then step.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:shouldRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Returns whether the route controller should be allowed to calculate a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:willRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called immediately before the route controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:didDiscard:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when a location has been discarded for being inaccurate.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:didRerouteAlong:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called immediately after the route controller receives a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:didFailToRerouteWith:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the route controller fails to receive a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:didUpdate:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the route controller’s location manager receive a location update.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.name: directions
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.abstract: The Directions object used to create the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.name: isDeadReckoningEnabled
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.abstract: If true, location updates will be simulated when driving through tunnels or other areas where there is none or bad GPS reception.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.name: checkForFasterRouteInBackground
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.abstract: If true, every 2 minutes the RouteController will check for a faster route for the user.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.name: routeProgress
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.abstract: Details about the user’s progress along the current route, leg, and step.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: resume()
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Starts monitoring the user’s location along the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: suspendLocationUpdates()
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Stops monitoring the user’s location along the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.name: location
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.abstract: The most recently received user location, snapped to the route line.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: recordFeedback(type:description:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Send feedback about the current road segment/maneuver to the Mapbox data team.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: updateFeedback(feedbackId:type:description:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Update the feedback event with a specific feedback ID. If you implement a custom feedback UI that lets a user elaborate on an issue, you can use this to update the metadata.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: cancelFeedback(feedbackId:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Discard a recorded feedback event, for example if you have a custom feedback UI and the user cancelled feedback.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: userIsOnRoute(_:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Given a users current location, returns a Boolean whether they are currently on the route.

Classes/RouteController.html.name: RouteController
Classes/RouteController.html.abstract: A RouteController tracks the user’s progress along a route, posting notifications as the user reaches significant points along the route. On every location update, the route controller evaluates the user’s location, determining whether the user remains on the route. If not, the route controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html.name: RouteControllerDelegate
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html.abstract: The RouteControllerDelegate class provides methods for responding to significant occasions during the user’s traversal of a route monitored by a RouteController.

Classes/RouteProgress.html.name: RouteProgress
Classes/RouteProgress.html.abstract: RouteProgress stores the user’s progress along a route.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html.name: RouteLegProgress
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html.abstract: RouteLegProgress stores the user’s progress along a route leg.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html.name: RouteStepProgress
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html.abstract: RouteStepProgress stores the user’s progress along a route step.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: isEnabled
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: A boolean value indicating whether instructions should be announced by voice or not.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: instructionVoiceSpeedRate
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: SSML option which controls at which speed Polly instructions are read.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: instructionVoiceVolume
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: SSML option that specifies the voice loudness.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: playRerouteSound
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: If true, a noise indicating the user is going to be rerouted will play prior to rerouting.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: rerouteSoundPlayer
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: Sound to play prior to reroute. Inherits volume level from volume.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: bufferBetweenAnnouncements
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: Buffer time between announcements. After an announcement is given any announcement given within this TimeInterval will be suppressed.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewControllerDidCancelNavigation(_:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user exits a route and dismisses the navigation view controller by tapping the Cancel button.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didArriveAt:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user arrives at the destination.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shouldRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns whether the navigation view controller should be allowed to calculate a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:willRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called immediately before the navigation view controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didRerouteAlong:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called immediately after the navigation view controller receives a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didFailToRerouteWith:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the navigation view controller fails to receive a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationMapView(_:routeStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLStyleLayer that determines the appearance of the route line.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationMapView(_:routeCasingStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLStyleLayer that determines the appearance of the route line’s casing.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationMapView(_:shapeDescribing:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLShape that represents the path of the route line.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationMapView(_:simplifiedShapeDescribing:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLShape that represents the path of the route line’s casing.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationMapView(_:shapeFor:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLShape that represents the destination waypoints along the route (that is, excluding the origin).

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationMapView(_:imageFor:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Return an MGLAnnotationImage that represents the destination marker.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationMapView(_:viewFor:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns a view object to mark the given point annotation object on the map.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: destination
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: An instance of MGLAnnotation that will be shown on on the destination of your route. The last coordinate of the route will be used if no destination is given.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: directions
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: An instance of Directions need for rerouting. See Mapbox Directions for further information.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: pendingCamera
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: An optional MGLMapCamera you can use to improve the initial transition from a previous viewport and prevent a trigger from an excessive significant location update.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: origin
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: An instance of MGLAnnotation representing the origin of your route.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: voiceController
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Provides access to various speech synthesizer options.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: routeController
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Provides all routing logic for the user.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: styles
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Styles that will be used for various system traits.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: mapView
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Provides access to the navigation’s MGLMapView with all its styling capabilities.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: snapsUserLocationAnnotationToRoute
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Determines whether the user location annotation is moved from the raw user location reported by the device to the nearest location along the route.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: sendNotifications
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Toggles sending of UILocalNotification upon upcoming steps when application is in the background. Defaults to true.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: showsReportFeedback
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Shows a button that allows drivers to report feedback such as accidents, closed roads, poor instructions, etc. Defaults to false.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: automaticallyAdjustsStyleForTimeOfDay
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: If true, the map style and UI will automatically be updated given the time of day.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: init(for:directions:styles:locationManager:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Initializes a NavigationViewController that provides turn by turn navigation for the given route. A optional direction object is needed for potential rerouting.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html.name: NavigationViewController
Classes/NavigationViewController.html.abstract: NavigationViewController is fully featured, turn by turn navigation UI.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: NavigationViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: The NavigationViewControllerDelegate provides methods for configuring the map view shown by a NavigationViewController and responding to the cancellation of a navigation session.

Other Global Variables.html.name: Other Global Variables
Other Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
